html:
4.13.25  2:43 am   hi im going to bed right now, can you make it so the q in 'ueqstions' is moved to the right so it says 'uesqtions' instead? it will make me laugh in the morning and also get up thakn you

      i'll change the whole site. just let me know how you want it. "the customer is always right"

4.13.25  2:38 am   what's the strangest dream you've ever had

      at least half of dreaming is too strange to even begin to put into words. So anything i could describe would be by far the least strange

4.13.25  2:10 am   what is a book

      just a very long document

4.12.25  11:48 pm   How many Bill Wurtz does it take to obtain the necessary materials, build, manufacture, sell, and efficiently operate a light bulb? 

      just 1 but i'm not going to do it right now

4.12.25  11:46 pm   are you good at math

      as long as i can do it myself

4.12.25  11:00 pm   meaning of life?

      movement

4.12.25  9:56 pm   there are some people who argue that listening to music is bad, or at least that there are great benefits to not listening to music for extended periods of time. admittedly i have difficulty accepting their argument. i find that music consumption is too integrated into how i've chosen to live my life to suddenly give it up one day for supposed "benefits". such a claim in my view may make music producers comparable to drug dealers in producing something addictive and inherently harmful to oneself. i can't shake the artistic value that music has to believe that somehow music can be harmful. if listening to music is bad, would playing it be also bad or somehow worse? it's just been something on my mind, and i would like to know what you think of it as a lifelong musician

      listening to music and not listening to music are both fine. although i'm sure that seems anti-climactic here

4.12.25  9:23 pm   Is this your first question from here today?

      no, but you will still win a prize

4.12.25  8:28 pm   i get a weird mix of awe and jealousy when i see people making things sometimes. because sometimes you come across people that are amazing at a whole bunch of different creative things, like making music, and drawing, and writing stories, etc. meanwhile, i'm sitting here trying to be good at just one of those things, and still not managing to get anywhere close. and it makes me feel inspired, because those people are awesome and cool, but also kind of defeated, because i feel like whatever i make will always be bad in comparison. and i know you're not supposed to compare yourself to other people, that you just have to focus on improving on your own work. but it's hard for me to do that, because i want to see what other people do so i can learn from it. so, how do i learn from others without comparing myself to them? i just feel so frustrated having all these ideas for things i want to do and make and never being able to execute them in a way that lives up to other people.

      the dirty secret here is that this is the exact same kind of question i get from those people who you are talking about

4.12.25  8:11 pm   would you agree that the past tense of seem should be semt instead of seemed?

      that could work but i'm not going to change it now

4.12.25  7:33 pm   I laughed too much i got scolded

      i'm sure it doesn't help that getting scolded can actually be very funny

4.12.25  6:57 pm   A normal number contains in itself every question and answer that ever will exist on this site in binary code. Thoughts?

      most readers will possibly interpret the phrase 'normal number' to mean an ordinary number, which might call to mind some integers between 0 and 100 let's say. but alas there's probably a math-specific definition of the word 'normal'. now that i think about it, 'ordinary' probably means something else too in math. There tends to be not enough words to go around, and even fewer ways to pronounce them. but this is not a new problem

4.12.25  6:37 pm   How often do you listen to your own songs?

      not at all before they exist, then very often while i'm making them, and then much more rarely after they've been completed

4.12.25  5:46 pm   Thoughts on the USA?

      never heard of it

4.12.25  4:29 pm   Hey Bill, I was the girl who tried saying 'hi' to you in Barnes & Noble on Thursday. Why did you yell "WHO THE FUCK DO YOU THINK YOU ARE?" and pull out a pocket knife? Just wanted to say I'm a big fan-still am. Just wish you were nicer to fans!

      ah, fan fiction. can't live with it, can't live without it

4.12.25  4:28 pm   What is one thing you will never buy again?

      individual grains of sand

4.12.25  4:17 pm   why is a bird a bird

      because you said so

4.12.25  3:56 pm   I want a microphone that is good for recording both vocals and instruments, do you think a dynamic or condenser mic is better

      how noisy of a place are you in

4.12.25  3:54 pm   do you think they might be giants

      they are clearly not giants

4.12.25  2:30 pm   what is your outlook on the future of pizza as a food?

      very confident. pizza is unshakable

4.12.25  1:31 pm   what is the hottest thing in earth

      one of the potatoes

4.12.25  12:56 pm   Near the end of 'I'm a Princess' is the ceiling in "there goes the ceiling" the same one that dreams fall from?

      no, i think i'm just addicted to ceilings at that point

4.12.25  12:07 pm   Do you write prose? 

      oh heck yeah. i'll write prose all day until the cows come home, or at least until about 4 o clock, whichever is later

4.12.25  11:54 am   Why are they called scarecrows and not crowscarers?

      first of all, the 'arers' is a disaster, that would never phoenetically survive. it would turn into 'crowscares'. and i think that would be a reasonable name, but i don't care which order the 2 parts are in. i also don't mind whether it's a "blauwe tafel" or a "table bleue"

4.12.25  7:02 am   What are your thoughts on the concept of ambiguity?

      dank

4.12.25  4:54 am   what do you do when you don't feel like doing anything?

      figure out why i'm wrong about thinking i don't feel like doing anything

4.12.25  3:42 am   meaning of life?

      movement

4.12.25  3:24 am   hey, what are your opinions on

... wait... fuck, this is pointless. what have we come to? asking about things we can research ourselves? discovering another's opinions instead of coming up with our own? this is honestly upsetting me, and it has been for ages. we should be able to not care if our opinions are harmlessly different. it's what makes us wonderfully unique. and we should also stop idolising or demonizing people, whom sometimes we barely know, for their otherwise harmless opinions or beliefs they display simply because it doesn't align with that of your own. your opinions are yours to find, regardless of anyone else, and i think it's time to think for ourselves-

never mind, i'm insecure. what are your opinions on tea?

      dare i say tea is not my cup of tea

4.12.25  2:59 am   have you ever made something you found too good so you had to make it worse

      no, it's usually more like this: sometimes things aren't good enough, and the only way to get around it is by making it worse. If something already seems incredibly good, then i have no problem with that. the problem is there's never any way to know what that actually is and how to achieve that

4.12.25  2:12 am   do you think people overthink when it comes to interpreting your videos/songs?

      just as long as they're not having too much fun

4.12.25  12:55 am   do you have a mental image of the piano/keyboard, and are you able to mentally "play" it and accurately imagine the music that comes out, all without help?

      sure, it's very similar to imagining a qwerty keyboard and imagining what words you could type, and how they would sound when spoken

4.11.25  11:48 pm   how often do you think about hammerhead sharks?

      maybe 1 time before

4.11.25  11:45 pm   what makes perfect intervals so perfect? give me an answer that has nothing to do with music theory or interval inversion.

      give me a question that doesn't tell me how to answer

4.11.25  11:26 pm   What is a question?

      don't worry about it

4.11.25  10:57 pm   thoughts on graphing calculators?

      should be age restricted. they are simply too entertaining

4.11.25  10:42 pm   Why didn't they name the Wurlitzer after you? It would be called the Wurtzlitizer.

      i think that would be a little too intense

4.11.25  9:37 pm   will there be any jumpscares in your next video?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.11.25  9:08 pm   what's 2 + 2

      an unforgettable combination

4.11.25  8:38 pm   what is your favorite kind of fruit

      pile of

4.11.25  5:51 pm   Do you have an answers page?

      are you kidding, there's answers on every page

4.11.25  4:15 pm   have you heard of ablaut before?

     i've never heard that word before, but now that i've checked what it means i certainly recognize this feature in english and also in dutch

     It's funny how instinctive it feels to native english speakers (and I imagine other languages which have it (i.e. most of the Indo-European ones + some i don't know about))

4.11.25  4:11 pm   There are always cycles I have that are feeling ok and feeling crushed. How do I get better without cycling.

     it would probably be impossible to avoid the up-down waves. but maybe you can find some activities that are most appropriate for the down times. think of it more like a boat going through a bit of weather

     I mean I cycle too, but I bicycle. Is that what that means?

      no, that's why i don't like to use the word 'cycle' for bicycle riding, because of the ambiguity you just highlighted

4.11.25  3:56 pm   Have you ever played the board game Clue?

      yes and i still don't know what a conservatory is

4.11.25  3:25 pm   when you wake up, do you go "which day is it?" in the same tone of "which game is it?" from i'm a huge gamer most of the time?

      no, but if i listened to that song more often i'm sure i would

4.11.25  2:47 pm   Besides Dutch have you learnt or have been learning other languages?

      i've made some fairly good progress in french

4.11.25  1:53 pm   should i have good times

      no, but the option is on the table

4.11.25  11:32 am   You say that stupidity is due to intelligence.

     not fair to just say i say that. i say only the second half, in response to a very specific question which you have not shown here

      Is the opposite true as well?

4.11.25  10:44 am   Do you have any car ride activities? 

      try to figure out where you are

4.11.25  10:35 am   Why can't I just let it be?

      why do you want to

4.11.25  9:59 am   can we take a trip to the farm that was in 2 friends on the beach

      i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no
